en-US: Automatically and immediately unlocks all tiles on the map when you start a new city (or load an existing one).
Adds 88 immediately-available tile unlocks when you first start a new city (all milestones will add their usual amount of tile unlocks on top of this).  Doesn't affect existing saves.
Allocates the additional 88 tile unlocks across all regular game milestones, in proportion to the normal amount for each milestone.  Doesn't affect existing saves.
Resets all 529 Tiles mod settings to default.
Reset all 529 Tiles settings to default?  This cannot be undone.
